content.detailedDescription: 8/3/15 spotted bright object in the sky out of the master bedroom window in the eastern sky. about the size of an aspirin held at arms length. it was high up, possibly 10 miles away. flashing/glittering.  upon first sight wondered if it were a star although i have never seen one "twinkle" in such a way with the naked eye. viewed through the binoculars it was very similar in appearance to the way a star looks through a telescope. except that i could see, very clearly, 4 points of light, triangular with a red light at the top, blue light in the center and two red lights at the base. there were multiple points of light coming off of it, like rays from a sun. it was not moving, at first, but staying still. there appeared, for a moment, to be a trail coming off it. moved downstairs to get a better view outdoors. as i descended the stairs, i could see it clearly through the stair case window. by the time i reached the back door, 5 seconds, it had disappeared. although it didn't move, n or s (left or right) it did get slightly smaller as if it were moving away. approximately 12 degrees off the horizon.
content.summary: Spotted triangular object red/blue/white flashing/glittering to the east hovering and then disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the blue moon on 7-31-15 when a black very huge object swept quickly across the moon. it was a very wide cylinder shape with a top sticking up in the middle. almost like a boat with a single sail, but a bit rounded.  it was larger to the naked eye than it is in my picture. moved incredibly fast. it looked like it was 1/3 the length of the moon. exciting, but freaked me out. picture does not do it justice.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the blue moon on 7-31-15 when a black huge object swept quickly past in front of the moon. it was huge with a rounded top in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:00pm, at my home in plymouth twp., mi. 3 nights in a row. looking towards the north a little above the tree line, i observed a strange orange light (less than a mile away) unwavering, constant light in a circular shaped hovering object which seems to be approaching closer and closer and than suddenly abruptly turns and travels so quickly it disappeared towards the east. very bright orange! the first day i really didn't know what to think, but seeing this happen 2 additional times made me really question what was happening? i cannot be the only person whom witnessed this!!? all of this happened within a matter of 15 seconds. my kids were divided some were awe struck others were frightened. i myself believe what i saw - yet am uncertain.
content.summary: 3 days in a row, i am observing the same events with regards to these ufo's. i cannot believe my eyes, my kids (8y& 12) were witness! unreal. bright orange light hovering than quickly disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west around 17:45 and noticed a bright shiny object in sky.  i'm sure the sun caused the reflection which caused it to be shiny.  it was stationary for about 15 seconds before it vanished.  it didn't fly off but disappeared right where it was hovering.  


*****

also i wanted to report that something personally happened to me march 2011.  i woke up one morning with a flash of an image of 3 greys staring at me.  i describe it like a camera flash that stays in your mind long enough for the flash to go away.  i don't think it was a dream.  it seemed very real.  but it has not happened again.
content.summary: Sun causing object to be shiny in tulsa west sky, stationary 15 seconds then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
It was july 31, 2015, just a little before midnight & i was checking out the moon, then i noticed a real bright yellow-orange light slowly rising from the western sky. i first thought it was another passenger airliner plane, but, soon realized it was much brighter & larger than any plane i've ever seen. it let out one flash where it got even brighter for about a second & then steadily continued towards the eastern sky. i lost sight of it as went over top of my building which was approximately straight up above my head. then i went back to observing the moon. 
it had a similar appearance & speed of travel as the fireball space junk that passed over nc last month, which i also saw & observed. 
i hope this helps any research/investigation that's following these sightings.
content.summary: Large & very bright orangey fireball-like with no trail light over nc

content.detailedDescription:
I saw an object (without magnification) that i could not recognize on wednesday night, july 22nd approximately 10:15pm (2015), shortly after i drove past the montvale service area of the garden state parkway driving northbound... 

my view of the object was extremely clear and distinct. it appeared to be some 150 feet across and about 1/2 mile away when i was closest to it, just above the treeline to the east. it seemed to be moving slowly to the north or was stationary as i was able to get much closer to the object, driving toward the new york state thruway.

it first had a classic saucer-like appearance: illuminated silver-metallic with a slightly flattened rim that projected around the middle. as i headed further north, it seemed to have changed its appearance. from my vantage point, it appeared brightest on the bottom with a golden glow, fading further up the object to orange, reddish, and then dark on top. despite the apparent change, it was still well illuminated, apparently from within, having taken on an overall dusky orange color with what i recall were 3 red lights on the bottom.
 
the rim appeared to have tilted so that the closer portion was lower than the far end. this made the craft look somewhat like the planet saturn (but much closer!), with its orange appearance, dark top, and rim that looked like the ring of a planet. also, like saturn, there seemed to be a gap between the rim and sphere! as cars on the garden state drove northbound, almost all slowed down dramatically, whether because their occupants were afraid of it or they simply wanted a better look. i was also driving northbound in the area for about 3-4 minutes, and gaps in the treeline enabled my view about 1/3 of the time...
content.summary: Metallic saucer like disk changed to a glowing orange sphere-like object with a saturn-like ring.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were on skidoos about 9 or 10 miles out of 100 mile house b.C. in the woods. we ended up in the middle of a 10 acre field behind were my friend lived and decided to take a break lean back on the seats to look at the stars for the sky was so clear and could observe the millions of stars with no trees in our field of vision so there was a panoramic view. we noticed about a dozen asteroids burning through the atmosphere then i saw a different but almost the same shape and color but a little larger object that didn't burn out and was traveling at such a high speed shoot across the sky from one end of our view to the center right above us. without slowing down the object stopped instantly for about 10 seconds then circled counter clockwise slowly that took about 10 seconds and stopped in the exact position it started to circle from, stayed in that position for about another 10 seconds then instantly took off at a very high rate of speed in the same direction it was traveling. a straight line from south to north until it was out of site. my unprofessional view is that the object was traveling at a speed of between 50 thousand and 100 thousand mph.
content.summary: Very high speed to an instant stop then circled slowly and stop and instant high speed and left

content.detailedDescription: I was fowling a car from local convince store with a short distance the car swerved too miss something . as too my reaction i swerved, i saw what was a large being maybe eight feet tall very thin . the arms were longer than normal, it had short black hair , it was waving as he jumped a large ditch. the legs look like that of a horse,the rear legs. it was fast ,from the time the driver swerved to miss it he had jumped the ditch and  it was gone. it took several seconds for my brain too register it, at first i thought might be a horse ,there are some down the road a mile but it was no horse.  wher this took place is only a mile or so from my house.Later that day i went by the spot, the ditch is large and he jumped with no problem, and it was gone.
content.summary: Was not ufo, it was a being, that in my opinion was not anything i know of.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pics of the clouds because i always do we were expecting a major storm saw what i thought was lightening getting ready to erupt took pic no lightening occurred but yet lights were still in sky looked at pic thought wth is that cropped pic to get s better look thought wth went to take more pics and object was gone looking further at pic i thought it kinda looked like a ufo so i took cropped pic and enlarged and took snap shot to get better view of it i was intrigued excited and baffled
content.summary: Disc shape gray sides black bottom yellow/white lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my backyard smoking a cigarette.  it was dark outside and it was partly cloudy and there was no wind.  i heard an airplane and just happened to look up to see it.  it was a passenger plane and was about 10000 ft.  i could see its running lights blinking.

as i was looking in the direction of the plane i noticed a huge bright light.  it was circular and looked like an orb.  it was bright silvery white in color.  other than being circular it had no other shape(s) to it.  it was was very bright and quite large.  if i held my arm straight out with my hand flat and the fingers straight up, my hand would not have covered the entire object.

it was in the eastern sky going from right (south) to left (north).  it was well below the plane and i could see it over the roof of my house.  i could just barely see the foothills that are located to the front of my house just over the peak of my roof.  it appeared to me that it was moving over these foothills.  it did not cast a light on the foothills.  it moved in a straight line.  it was moving very slowly.  

near the end of my sighting the orb entered a cloud and winked out.  i do not know if the light disappeared or if it was blocked by the clouds.
content.summary: I was standing in back yard, saw a plane and then noticed orb below that about size of house.

content.detailedDescription: Taking pics of the clouds moving in because we were due for a major storm while looking up i saw lights thought it was lightening ready erupt snapped pic looked at phone said wth zoomed in couldn't figure out what i was seeing cropped pic looked again and thought boy that looks like a ufo went to get more pics and object disappeared enlarged pic on phone and took snap shot to study was excited and baffled
content.summary: Circular disc with lights, black bottom grey sides

content.detailedDescription: Apareciã³ por el norte dejando una estela...Se detuvo un momento parpadeando y desapareciã³ por el noroeste....Hay varios testigos y yo tengo una foto clara
content.summary: Bola de fuego intensa que se detuvo y despuã©s desapareciã³ en lã­nea recta...Parpadeando

content.detailedDescription: I saw a disc shaped object flying at low altitude while driving my car at sunset so i asked my son to take some pictures with my iphone. the object was moving but the road had some curves so i couldn't see well its movements. however, it disappeared quickly because after the curve shown in the last picture, we couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: I saw a disc shaped object while driving my car

content.detailedDescription: My 15 year old son actually sent me this photograph, in fact a series of them.  there were a number of planes in the south as there were fireworks that night, and amateur pilots sometimes come to watch them, but he observed this object in the opposite direction and unlike the planes because it was: in the other direction, hovering, and did not display coloured navigation lights as the planes did.  i was out, and he was really surprised by it, and started sending me pictures to see what i made of it.  i think he felt kind of spooked by it, although he was not really sure why.  he's a practical, smart kind of kid and not prone to flights of fancy or easily frightened.  after a few minutes it just disappeared.  i was not far away and tried to see the object at the same time but the area i was in was heavily bordered by trees.
content.summary: Hovering in view of my son's window.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and myself viewed something un-explainable in the early night sky last summer.  a small missel shaped object glowing in all colors slowly flew in a straight line above our automobile.  from driver side to passenger side, 20 feet off the ground towards the north east.  i was amazed, but did not try to pursue object.
content.summary: Miniature glowing slow flying missel shape 20 feet in air over our vehicle.  we slowed to observe. watched it leave our viewing area osceola ave. at lexington pkwy.

content.detailedDescription:
My one and only ufo sighting occurred in the middle 1970’s and was witnessed by two other people, my sister and a neighborhood friend. i have considered reporting this many times over the years and have finally decided to tell what happened in the hope that others may have seen the same objects and they will come forward as well. i wish to remain anonymous
it was in late october, middle 1970’s, during the week of halloween. the three of us decided to go out play halloween jokes on our friends and neighbors. we had been running up and down the street, yelling, and having fun. when we got to the west end of the street which was quite a distance from the last streetlight. we then noticed a car coming into town on route 265 which runs parallel to the street we were on. playing as children do, we ran to hide from sight of the car driver. i ran out into the weeds near the edge of the creek and the others ran the opposite direction, back towards the street light and up into a yard above the street to hide in the bushes around a house. when the car had passed by i started walking back in the direction the other two had gone to hide. when i got under the streetlight i saw both of them standing on the hill above the road, pointing towards the light pole and moving backwards. i looked up at the pole and found i was standing under three, dull silver, discs that were hanging motionless about three feet above the light pole. the discs were all identical and had the look of brushed aluminum with a bright white light on the bottom. while the light was bright, it was not clear and resembled the look of a ceiling light with a frosted white shade, only brighter. they were ten to fifteen feet in diameter, somewhat curved on the bottom and around three to four feet thick from the bottom to the centerline of the disc. i could not see the top half as i was standing almost directly underneath them. i do remember hearing a buzzing sound but i’m not sure if it was coming from the streetlight, as many of those lights made a noise at that time, or if it was coming from the discs. i turned to look at my sister and our friend and they were standing some distance back on the hillside at a level that would have been about half the distance from the bottom of the discs to the ground. i turned my attention back to the discs and started to bend down to pick up a rock to throw at one of the discs. as i bent down i saw the disc on my right, which was the one farthest west, start to wobble and move slowly to the west. i backed away from them while watching the moving disc tip up and down like a boat does when riding moderate waves. this disc kept moving off slowly to the west and i watched it until it had traveled about one quarter mile then i looked back up at the other two. they had moved off to the south and were steadily moving up and away at about a 35 degree angle. my sister and our friend came down to the street and we watched them all move off until they were points of light that faded from view. we ran home to tell our parents and they really didn’t pay us much attention as we were out playing jokes when this happened and they thought we were joking with them.
never since have i seen airborne vehicle that resembled these three craft. i didn’t see any windows and i don’t recall seeing any seams, joints, rivets or indication of assembled panels. the color most resembled brushed aluminum. as i remember, i didn’t feel fear but just awe for what i was seeing. i believe my sister and friend were somewhat afraid but still amazed at the sight of these objects. 
i hadn’t seen my childhood friend for quite a few years then i saw him at a dinner and the first thing he asked was if i remembered the discs. we talked about our memories of them and we still recall the series of events in the same way. occasionally my sister and i talk about that experience as well. to this day i wish i would have hit one of those discs with that rock to see what reaction it might have had. if i ever have another opportunity i will do whatever i can to strike, shoot, or damage the object in the hope of invoking a reaction.
content.summary: Three silver discs hovering over a streetlight/power pole

content.detailedDescription:
My dad and i suddenly had a thought (at the same time) to walk to the back spring and check the water - approximately 1000 feet from the farmhouse.
walking to the back spring i noticed yellow green lights forming lines across the ground in a non-distinct pattern. my dad did not want to pay attention to lines - he was focused on getting to the spring. it was coming on dusk now and lights seemed to grow brighter.
the field had recently been cut but i could not figure out the lines - they looked like laser beams laying on the ground.
we both arrived at the spring and i tried to get some water; when i looked up, dad was starring at the edge of the bush and there about 60 feet away were two sets of eyes that lite up from dad's flashlight. they stepped forward - i told dad that were aliens - for what ever reason he thought they were bears. they zapped us with a small wand that froze our muscles completely. i can remember saying to myself, "concentrate, move your foot", and i did - at which point i was zapped again.
on board their ship i awoke beside an alien who was surprised that i was not distressed at her appearance. i call this being a "her" - i do not know why - she was more grasshopper looking then then creatures on the ground - who looked more like the "greys". i had many questions for her and she was willing to answer all except one which to explain their propulsion system as she said i could not understand. i asked to stay onboard and travel with them - she was impressed (i think) by my lack of distress and my many questions - she took me to see another large grasshopper type and poised the same question about me staying on board. this is where they set me up in a test ( i did not know at the time) where they left me in a room, like a control room and i was told not to touch anything. i could not help myself - i tried to figure out the controls and started moving some of them - the large grasshopper came back in and was very upset - the her took back to another area where i passed my dad being operated on - i think this was another test because i lost it - i have more
to tell, like why they are here, why they need us etc.
content.summary: Answers from aliens

content.detailedDescription:
Hi nice to meet you. i m manu from france, im 37. 
the day 16 of june of 2012 at 11:25pm,me and my wife were at bed but not sleeping, at bed since 5 minutes  and i saw a red ball flying outside by the window, i gone to the window and i saw only one red ball, i called my wife to come and when i came back, 8 more ufos where appeared, i started recording with my phone but the resolution was too bad, and we don t see clearly the balls but we can see it was red.
 it was cold so i was trembling so the videos not very good but my wife and i are comenting the ufos, and i could see that each one was about 150meters of diameter and were moving the same speed, silently and keeping the same espace between them. my wife was afraid, and me... not at all   but excited! we looked the ufo dispearing far away. i sent the video to the geipan the "unexplained flying phenom group" of france but they said it was asiatics lantern.... wrong!! they try to make us believe it s something normal from human... the flight last more than 12 miles so very long for asiatics lantern dont you think??


last year a ufo was flying above my home, and i thought maybe he can or not but i tried to contact him just thinking. i asked to him to make a big light after i count till 3, 1 2 3 and then he made a flash! i was so surprised, i decided to do it again.
 i asked to him if he could receive my message and if yes he had to make a new flash, and he did it!. i want you to know that till the moment i saw it coming from far away, he didn t do nothing specialn the light was always the same, a white ball in the sky, very high and without noise. 
before he desapear behind the top of the house i asked to fash again and guess what, he did it again.
 i know it seem like crazy but it s true. after this i decided to do it but with another way. i started to present me and say i m from earth planet, (always in my mind) i said if anyone space traveller come over my house, i would like he pass between a star i choosen and i, the same night 4 differents ufos coming from differents direction passed where i asked.
 i decided to change of star (the same night) and a new ufo coming from in front , far away comes in direction of the star i choosen. one he passed there, i asked to make a flash if he can receive my message  after 3, i started counting 1, 2, 3 and then he made the flash.
i woke up my wife for she could see it, so she came at the window with me, and i showed her the direction where to look, i asked it to the ufo my wish, and then he flashed again before to disapear. my wife said i was crazy to do it . i don t know if i m crazy but i need to do it when i can. i did it about 10 or 15 times. i bought a pair of binoculars for spring, (weather will be better) we sleep under the roof, and we have windows on it so it s really big the sky, full of stars.  
i hope you believe me, because, i m sure they are here.

after this, the next day i phoned to police and they told me nobody called to inform about this night.... and there was not asiatics lantern authorization for this night( here youan not let flying asiatic lantern without authrization)

people is afraid of the look of the others, not us because at this moment we were in this state snce a few months and so didnt know people..

i hope you liked my adventures, hope to live more soon!
waiting for your reply or questions. 
see you later
manu
content.summary: 9 orange balls flying in 2 groups first 7 ufos and second 2 behind

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the iss make it's way across the sky. another bright object came into view at a different trajectory but much faster (at least 3x) but on an intersecting path to the iss. it was apparent it was at a slightly higher altitude. at the point where it appeared it was going to intercept the iss it stopped short and disappeared. it reappeared seconds later and moved directly away, the light gradually dimming until non-visible.
content.summary: Object chasing the iss

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was watching tv in the living room, noticed the sunset and clouds looked pretty. i wanted pictures of the sunset. it was raining but the clouds near the sunset were interesting. it was very windy.

2. i didn't notice the objects at the time. i only noticed them when i was looking at the pictures a few weeks after.

3. i thought it may have been a palm tree trunk flying in the wind.

4. when i noticed the first object i thought it was a palm tree trunk flying and when i looked closer i noticed several objects in the same picture, it wasn't that windy that there would be up to 4 tree trunks flying. each picture had a different amount of objects.

5. when i realized it couldn't be tree trunks i ask my husband and friends look at the pictures and known of them had a clue what it could be. i didn't know who to send the photos to. i was watching youtube and watched a hanger 1 episode and realized maybe mufon could help me figure out what these objects are.

i would like to know if it's a natural phenomenon or it may have been ufo's. thank you fo any help in finding out what they could've been.

sincerely, 
t.P
content.summary: Looks like telephone poles

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a trip with family into the roosevelt national forest and i took many pictures on the way up. when i got home i looked over them and saw a object with 4 glowing lights on the bottom and it seemed to be fly near the tip of 
the moutain. i did not notice it at the time of the picture
content.summary: Went on vacation and saw a ufo like object in my photos

content.detailedDescription:
At 4:30am est my family and i awoke to travel to the jacksonville, nc airport.  

at approximately 4:50 we exited the condo and gazed at the clear starlight sky, and the image of the moon.  it was then that we witnessed what appeared to be an aircraft traveling at high altitude in a west to east direction, the path was parallel to the horizon, and estimated to be 50-60 degrees relative to our position.  the object was bright, showed no flashing or pulsating lights.  suddenly the object changed direction, an estimated 30 degrees and not only accelerated but also ascended in the direction of the moon.

when the object reached the moon, it was never seen again.  if it was a conventional aircraft, it would have re-appeared following transiting the moon and continued on its previous path.  

in summary, an object believed initially to be an aircraft was witnessed traveling e-w in the nights sky, abrubtly changed directed, ascended and accelerated toward the moon and disappeared.  total time viewed is estimated to be 1 minute 30 seconds.  4 witnesses viewed the object.
content.summary: Bright light spotted in the se morning sky, travelled across the horizon then changed direction and disappeared behind the moon

content.detailedDescription:
While camped on top of mt panorama during the bathurst 1000 2014 car races, i had occasion to walk away from the camp fire at around 10am to answer the call of nature. the night was clear and if i remember correctly the sky was relatively dark with many stars out , the view from my position on mount panorama is amazing with good views of the lights of bathurst to the north and the surrounding farmland to the west, north and east of the town. 
while answering the call and looking out to the west north west i saw an unusual light in the sky about 25deg above the horizon, on a closer look it was not one light but four balls of light or orbs close together almost touching in a perfect horizontal line. the orbs where some what in the distance possibly above the next row of hills across the valley maybe 4-5 km away, they where small but you could clearly make them out, two orbs where red and two where blue. at first glance i thought that it may have been a police light of sorts due to the colour however on closer inspection you could clearly see that the light where well above the distance hills and the most unusual thing was that they was perfectly still,i watched the lights for 4-5 min and they didn't appear to move at all, directly below the lights closer to me was a large gum tree that i was using as a reference point. looking at the lights i kept expecting them to move as that would explain them away as a helicopter or a balloon. 
i continued to look until my eyes hurt ,the light appeared to be fading and getting smaller, when i looked away for a moment and looked back the lights where gone.
at no point did the lights or orbs blink like a aircrafts navigation lights also you could clearly see that the lights where balls of light not single points of light. the balls where not really glowing and emitting light like a light globe does they had a softer inner glow. i couldn't see any structure with the lights and a no point did the lights separate.
even though there where thousands of people camped on the mountain no one i know saw or reported it or discussed it.
at the time being newly interested in the concept of ufos and discussing them with a friend the previous night i was shaken with what i saw as i had lived under flight paths all my life and knew what aircraft at night look like, but actually seeing something i really couldn't explain away was a little confronting, i didn't even mention it to my friend who was still there with me for fear of him thinking i was making it up to back our discussion the previous night, it took months before i mentioned it to anyone. i have now only reported this after looking into the ufo subject and realising the importance of reporting these observations.
content.summary: Obsered 4 stationary orbs at mount panorama bathurst

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving farmer's market, grocery store on september 29, 2014, at 6:38 in the evening.  and i seen that there was a very beautiful sunset, which made me want to take a few pictures of it.  i did not notice the objects at that time, until i observed the pictures later that evening.  that is when i noticed that there were 3 objects, and also what appeared to look like a larger cloud in the shape of a spaceship.  at in one of the pictures there is only 2 objects, the disc looking one was coming out of the sunset where there were clouds.  on another picture that object was no longer in the clouds, and then there appeared to be a 3rd object which was near the cloud that looked like a spaceship shape.  the pictures i took show them there and then gone all in the same time, 6:38 p.M.  and the last picture i took the 3 objects were gone, but the cloud still remains and never changed shape.  i finally decided at this time that i should seen this to mufon.  i still have the pictures i took on my cellphone, but i am not sure how to attach these pictures.
content.summary: There were 3 different objects, 2 disc and the other not sure.  and a cloud that appeared to look like a big spaceship as well.

content.detailedDescription: During the night 3-4 weeks previous to incident date at 4am i awoke to hear a very loud, low tone pulsating noice directly over my house the noise was off consitant strength on each pulse and as i woke up and it was directly over the objects on my bedside table were vibrating against the surface they are on and my window was also vibrating with the pulse. i lay and listened, i have worked as a boat engine mechanic and i knew that this noise was a propultion engine unlike any i have ever heard. i listened and tracked the noise of this pulsating to be able to estimate its location in the sky the noise would become louder and quiter again as it slowly combed my residential area in a grid like pattern (likely following the streets) it was moving only around 5mph and the pulses were around 2 seconds apart. after around 40 mins i heard the craft quickly getting louder and coming closer until the noise was directly overhead. petrified i used an advanced meditation technique to calm myself and drift into a dream. it was jsut an assumption but i felt the craft was scanning a grid of my area mapping it, once it had completed the area it returned to all points of interest while scanning. i believe i was a point of interest as i was awake and aware as it passed over. 4 weeks later (this is my report) i was in my lounge at 3-4am i was very awake and not tired as i had been working nightshifts in the week so my bodyclock was completely set to being awake at night. i heard the same pulsating engine noise approaching from the nw where my windows are placed. i could hear the craft was a long way out still very quiet, as it got closer is changed direction and started traveling north, i didnt see the craft as the way the houses are placed i can only see things overhead and within 200-300 metres infront. i turned all electricals and lights off and sat there waiting for it to return, around 40 mins later the craft approached head on from the nw again and flew directly over my house at treetop level, the craft had a higher wing section flat surface square underwing section that blocked the entire sky from my viewpoint, (i couldnt see the ends of either hosital edge so i estimate the wingspan to be around 400 metres hoszontally by 600-800 metteres nose to tail) the material was completely obsured as there were powerfull yellow and orange (spot lights similar to in a police helicopter) stratgeically placed in grid formations in 10 metre square areas, with much brighter spotlights every 50 meters squared at the corners. these more powerful lights cast a solid beam of light through the sky and were all moving indepandatly in a scanning searching motion (each seemed individually controled and were moving not in a sweeping motion but more like a fast human eye, locking in quickly to points of interest tracking that for a half second then jumping to another random point below and repeating. as the tail of the craft approached the was a porta cabin like room suspended below the craft aprox 30 meteres across 20 meters front to back, the entire front surface was windows with heavy dull blue metal victorian sash window looking frames, each crosssection of windowframe was covered in a thin layer of frost and ice similar to an extra cold bar tap, the glass of each window was yellow heavily translucent material almost opaque, it looked how a window of abandoned camper might look very grimey and dusty from the inside, each window that would appear head height if you were stood inside the (cockpit) were slightly clearer in a cirular motion (still dirty around the edges) as if someone from the inside had wiped the window, much like when a cars front window steams up. as this room was suspended below the wing and the wing was so low i estimate the bottom of this cockpit flew past barely missing scraping my roof by 10 metres. as i was in a second story room this cockpit flew right past me just overhead so i got a good look at it, the material in the glass and the metal used in the window payne are materials i have never seen in my adult life as an engineer. i suspect the frost on the metal window paynes is from the craft being at very high altitudes just previous and the thin layer of frost would melt over time as it is in this lower altitude, there was a small dim glow of light coming from the cockpit windows but as the material was quite thick and yellow like not much light was coming out, strangely though the exterior of the cockpit was very well lit from the amount of lights on the wing above. the whole thing looked like a victorian train cart with a giant carbon wing on top. i say victorian as the contruction seemed somewhat old fashioned. bordering on steampunk. later that night i went to sleep and awoke to find 3 entities and the rear of my bed. all 3 where wearing all black the one directly infront and to the left of them they were taller, around 6ft5 they where very slim and had hoods up that concealed their faces, i had left my windows open buy closed my curtains when i went to sleep, when i woke up my curtains were open and my windows were closed so i could see a little from the moonlight through the window. the 3rd entity was next to my bedside. as i awoke i had been proper up my pillows so i was sat upright, as i came too i knew something wasnt right, i couldn't move and the enitity to my right was holding my right arm at the wrist, leaning some weight on it with his right hand. the entity to my right holding my arm was smaller in height but very muscular and strong, i could feel the intence force he was putting on my wrist with little or no effort. his face was very close to mine and he dind't have a hood on, instead he had a black scrap of cloth like a bandanna tied across his mouth and nose like a surgeon would have. his face was undeniably an orc's face. very fat an muscular, big produded cheek muscles and cheek bones, he was wearing black leather gloves and an all black outfit with black leather breastplate with leather straps just like ancient samurais are portrayed wearing. there was a gap between his glove and sleve where i could see a very muscular dark green forearm, the face was also green with black hair similar to a human. as i woke up there were all very startled as if i shouldn't of been able to wake up. i tried with all of my might to come too and inflict feelings of anger and primal rage through my eyes as i looked the orc in the eye. he looked at the two tall beings at the end of my bed then reached into a bag behind him whilst still holding my wrist, as he was looking for something i was gaining in power and feeling more and more able to move, i felt like i was shaking of an anaesthetic, i started to raise my left hand to try and grab the orbs hand off my right. as i did one of the smaller entity becan to crawl towards me over my bed, whilst looking at that i sensed the orcs weight change on my right wrist, i looked to my right and he had a large syringe in my face, as i turned to him he squirted the entire syringe into my nose and i instantly became paralysed again, i remember looking at them and they started to dispear infron of my eyes, i started drifting unwillingly into a deep sleep, as i was drifting off i heard a conversation in an alien language i couldn't understand. i have alot of experience in the past meditation and lucid dreaming, i also have alot of experience with drug use in the past (nothing that could relapse something like this) so am very aaware of altered mind states and when i am and am not dreaming etc and when i am or am not been anaesthetised. the nearest drug i can compare the liquid they quirted in my nose is a pure form of valium or morphene.
content.summary: Saw ship pass over my house at treetop level, later abduction face to face

content.detailedDescription: It was in the month of may, at night(23.00pm) i saw a fast moving light, blinking sequentially... then later disappeared... it strange as this aircraft is could not be seen...It was flying so low but could not see the body. even the airforce could not pick up any signal from it.
content.summary: Blinking light, moving at very low altitudes flying as fast as an attack helicopter(serious)

content.detailedDescription: In my car stargazing admiring the full moon and from a afar saw what appeared to be a airplane as usual. but as it flew by swiftly but quick not luke most airplanes pass by around here made no roaring noise but soft sound. triangle shape pulsing lights flew by abnormally quick. i was feeling confused to how fast it was going and how the sound of the craft was emitting. lost sight as it made its way past the mountain descending.
content.summary: triangle shape craft flew by slow but swiftly.

content.detailedDescription:
1: looking out over the back yard
2: it lit up so bright couldn't see anything but the light
3: possible meteor/shooting star but the whole area was illuminated in the extreme; event had slight physical affects, eyes hurt, ears popped and headache onset 15-20 minutes afterwards
4:no object seen however light appeared from the sky and lit the whole backyard up brighter than daytime, i looked up i couldn't see as i was blinded in all directions, the moon was bright and slightly cloudy out, after light was gone, normal as before... as nothing happened, no trace of anything.
5:cat was near me at the time and took off when it happened, i was shocked and extremely curious as to what just happened, no time to react...  went on the net to see if there any local cameras i could rewind to see but no luck, if someone is to search the area for webcams from aug 3, 2015 3:58am est to 4:00am est they should see in in the town of fairfax city near woodson highschool.
6:was a 2 second event, +/- a second, happened so quick its hard to cogitate what happened and exact duration..
content.summary: Blinding white bright light, ears popped, no sound, affected cats

content.detailedDescription: Walking sauk trail on the east side of swan lake on a sunny clear day noticed an unsual light about 60 degrees above the western horizon. i looked at for a few seconds trying to analyze it. from stationary it moved toward the west by southwest, suddenly it morphed into a cylinder shaped object with two reflective or light emitting bulbs on both ends it morphed back into an orb then completly vanished from sight.My feelings were i have seen and expereinced these things frequent enough that i think there is another one just different and always interesting sometimes good sometimes quite otherwise.
content.summary: Walking trail at swan lake on east side sunny clear day noticed bright orb or light 60 degrees above western horizon stationary unusual after a few seconds it moved west by southwest trajectory morphed into a cylinder with two bulbs on each end .

content.detailedDescription:
Date: sun, 2 aug 2015 19:57:36 -0400

a few days before the occurrence i had a panic attack which gave me a premonition that the orbs are coming back (this is something that happens with me frequently).  but this time i had a strong feeling so i went outside and positioned one of my security cams pointing to the sky. the day of the sighting july 25,2015 my beautiful dog sasha, 11 years young,i, my mom & others loved her very much, began to act strange and restless. so this made me think something was possibly recorded, so i first checked the footage on the security camera around 3:00 pm. and saw the first 3 orbs in a small triangle shape which was recorded at 11:24 am and again twice more through the day when i saw more orbs. my mom and i were shocked at seeing these.I showed her a few days after as she's never seen them before, these orbs were moving slowly over petrolia with 1 of the orb`s fading out in the group of 3 just before going overhead,  the next 2 lights were going across my cam screen & 1 turned to the left at 14:30 pm hrs. the larger 3 orbs shaped like a uniform triangle was  recorded  around 18:02 hrs.Est and have no idea if there were more of these or not??? off my cam,
at 7:30 am july 26, sasha came in my bedroom & woke me up, she was moving her paws all over and moaning. i noticed the swelling in her tummy and immediately i called my vet, i knew something was wrong & just after i started telling her these things, sasha got up on her front legs, cried & went back to floor, she said to bring her in to the animal hospital right away. she sadly passed away shortly before 10 am of a spleen hemorrhage. i feel that this was a very strange thing to have happened at the same time as the orbs. sasha had been with me during other strange sightings in forest ont., canada which i feel had an emotional impact on both of us.
 sasha & i saw a few of these in forest ont canada in 2008 & 9 like the first orbs seen in a photo a reporter from the forest standard published on july 10, 08   i noticed in the top of the photo a ball orb like the one i saw in a photo that i took in later july of 2008 at about 17:oo  hrs  est. pm. i noticed this dark orb thing up above the trees in forest & i asked  the photo tech what he thought it was. he checked it with a magnifying glass and said it's not a defect with the negative,or my professional film camera as he checked it too. so it definitely looks to be something taken in the photo a ball or something.  i still have these  pics. i received messages during  panic attacks in aug of o8. that there would be more sightings very soon. at the end of sept 2008 i was more paranoid walking my dog which continued to bother me. my doctor advised  me to take only short walks. on the 20 of oct 2008 i walking her close to my apt. around 22:30 pm when i sighted the orb. i saw this bright ball of fuzzy light coming from the other side of forest just over buildings and houses and i thought it was a plane or helicopter with a searchlight but as it was getting closer i noticed there was no sound or blinking lights, nothing just an orb, like a ball of cotton it was fuzzy around the edge. as we came to our apt,after sasha was finished her home work!!!, which was 20 steps up to second floor where my apt was this orb about the size of car tire hovered over the old 3 story royal bank building, up above an aerial on the roof we watched it for about 30 secs., then it just vanished. 
 my next sighting was on jan 9, 2009 at 14:30 hrs est. sasha & i were having a great walk on the trail we loved and i let her run free after her ball and noticed a small blue, white,& yellow plane around 200 ft in front of us going over a farm field & this dark ball like object which i thought was a camera was in front of the plane, as it got closer i realized it wasn't. before the plane went over our heads the orb went around to the back of it. the plane made a sharp turn as if checking on the orb location, it was in front of sasha & me about 70 feet up and i feel it put us in a bubble like thing & we were lifted from the ground. i tried looking  at her, she was looking up tilting her head to one side, i was feeling this bubble was around us & i couldn't move my arms or legs or barely move my head & i was scared.  tried to speak to sasha she didn't even look at me & my voice was like rubberized or,,,,,we couldn't hear the birds sing or nothing, i felt we were in a time warp. i lost time on my watch & i don't remember what else happened but  do remember that the orb vanished and  the plane came back around. suddenly i found sasha and i were both laying on the ground, we got up and i noticed we both had dirt on us and started to walk home, which usually takes 5 -8 mins but this time it took us a long time like 20-30 mins. we were both like hypnotized or hung over or something. 
future attempts to walk in that area were not possible  because it caused great anxiety in both sasha and i.  i would throw her ball near the little bridge on the trail but she didn't want to go anywhere near it which she loved to do before this sighting.
in february 28, 2009 at about 17:40 pm, i have a hard time  explaining this but i can say as sasha & i were sitting on the side of a hill watching the sunset, a bright transparent orb was coming across the farm field slowly & made a sharp l turn &  it started getting bigger as it was coming closer to us, i'm not sure what size it was  about 200 or so feet away, then it started disappearing slowly but i could see  the sun set through it so i can't explain that , sasha & i ran home as fast we could after the other occurrence had freaked us out.  we didn't see any more until the occurrences at the top of this letter, but i did see a ball of lightning in a thunder storm at the back of my apt in forest  2009 it lasted 6 seconds,i never seen one of these before ether.
content.summary: 5 sightings 2 of which were tryangel shapes others were just single orbs
